name: Kuhu
wishText: I'll be sad that again you'll be older ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!!Wishing you a many BLAH BLAH BLAH ...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
wishHeading: Happy Birthday to my dearest ANIMAL in my Zoo!
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it ?
replayText: Otherwise , I'll see you when we meet  :^)
